detail_desc: Double-layered tube scarf in jersey.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline and long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in patterned jacquard-weave viscose in a double layer at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Treggings in stretch narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a glittery all-over print, an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Metal hair clip with a glittery decoration at the top and hair extensions. Length approx. 34 cm.
Leotard in soft jersey with long sleeves and a tulle skirt. Press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in a fine rib knit. Deep v-neck, decorative buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a draped detail at the front. Width approx. 11.5 cm.
Bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with a collar and long sleeves with picot trims. Press-studs at the back and crotch.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave. Regular waist with concealed elastication, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.

V-neck blouse in a jacquard weave with a wrapover front with a concealed button, hook-and-eye fastening and narrow ties at the side. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
Plastic water bottle with a non-drip, push-button lid and a practical carry strap at the top.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Coat in woven fabric made from a felted wool blend with a stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Diagonal, welt front pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Derby shoes with open lacing, fabric insoles, and imitation leather and fabric linings. Rubber soles.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric.
Bandeau bras in soft cotton jersey with side support and lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. No fasteners.
Large scarf in a soft weave with short fringes along the edges.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports bras in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh, and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, stretchy cotton jersey in various designs.
Bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Joggers in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton and modal jersey with a wide neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Wide, sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck with a pleat centre front. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with appliqués on the front, a round neck and buttons down the front. Scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem with short slits in the sides.
Set with swim shorts and a patterned swim top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long sleeves and a frill trim at the hem. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined crotch. UPF 50.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra top in microfibre with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and wide, elasticated ribbing at the hem. No fasteners. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Tie in a solid colour and a matching, spotted handkerchief in satin. Width of tie 6.5 cm, size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Trousers in a textured weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, jetted back pockets and tapered legs.
Metal necklaces decorated with sparkly glass stones. One short necklace and a longer necklace with a long pendant. Adjustable length, 27-38 cm and 38-48 cm.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist with pleats at the front. Unlined.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short thin metal chain necklace with a spider-shaped pendant. Adjustable length, 33-40 cm.
Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lace. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Short coat in soft, felted fabric with a shawl collar and a large, detachable faux fur collar. Concealed press-studs down the front, welt side pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a single back vent. Lined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft jersey with long sleeves, and press-studs down the front and along one leg. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back, lined cups with removable inserts and an elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Warm-lined, high profile boots in imitation leather with covered block heels, a visible seam centre front and a zip in one side. Velour linings and insoles.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Studio Collection. Glittery, sequined dress inspired by the pop and rock era of the 1970s in a straight and tapered fit. Wide, defined, padded shoulders, a deep V-neck and wide pleats at the top that relax lower down to add movement to the skirt. Long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Lined. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Oversized cardigan in soft, fine-knit cashmere with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Jacket in washed denim with a pile collar and press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets, a flap chest pocket with a press-stud, adjustable tabs with press-studs at the sides and press-studs at the cuffs. Pile lining.
Hipster briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Fitted, cold shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with long raglan sleeves.

Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch flexible denim for maximum mobility. Hard-worn details that are patched on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuit in wool with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with a scarf detail.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and frills at the top and hips. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit is recycled.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Wide waist panel.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Short fitted top in viscose jersey with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front panel with a knot detail at the hem.
Sun hat in cotton poplin. Width of brim 5 cm. Lined.
Skirt in pleated chiffon with covered elastication at the waist, an overlocked hem and jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck and straight-cut hem.
Oversized jumper in a soft wool and mohair blend knit with low-dropped shoulders and wide balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless blouse in airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, and tie-front hem. Longer at the back.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Key pocket in the waistband.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length, 43-50 cm.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a slight sheen and a detachable faux-fur lined hood. High collar with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs, flap side pockets with a press-stud and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Drawstring at the waist, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a back vent. Partially lined with faux fur.
Tube scarf in soft, garter-stitched cotton with ribbed trims at the ends and a small imitation leather appliqué.

Short dress in a patterned jacquard weave with short sleeves and decorative gathers at the shoulders and back. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam under the bust and a detachable tie belt with plastic D-rings. Pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline that has a small opening and concealed button at the back. Long sleeves with slits and ties. Unlined.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with overlocked seams for optimum comfort. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a washed look, hard-worn details, a zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hat and tube scarf in soft, patterned jersey.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, a double-layered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless body in ribbed jersey with a square neckline and press-studs at the crotch.
